welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ashburn, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport houses ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints for all airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse Z
terminals.description: Concourse Z at Washington Dulles International Airport serves international flights for United Airlines and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, serving primarily American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, serving primarily Delta and United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves both commercial and general aviation flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
